California governors:
Pete Wilson, Gray Davis...

prime, choice...

Utah, Oklahoma...

AMPLE ROT

A chemical neurotransmitter that affects mood:
ONION REST

A control center:
MY ALPHA SHOUT
Introduced in 2007, this Marc Jacobs fragrance might have women asking, "He loves me?  He loves me not?"
Mandarin & Patchouli are scents in this male soccer star's Instinct cologne
A fruity fragrance, DKNY Be Delicious comes in a bottle shaped like one of these
In 2012 his Big Pony collection of fragrances for women was introduced
Wrap yourself in this Estee Lauder fragrance whose name suggests a clean, crisp fabric
Forged by dwarfs, Draupnir was this precious piece of Odin's jewelry that could make gold
Hugin & Munin were a pair of these crow-like birds that Odin used to scout ahead & bring him news
When Odin had his steed Sleipnir reshod, he had to shell out for this many shoes
Odin's sons by Frigga were Hermod, Hodur & this beloved son who died in a tragic accident
Odin is killed along with most other Norse gods in this final battle

40 miles WSW of Edinburgh, population 600,000:
this city

Flowing from Bismarck to Omaha:
this river

Bordering Colombia, Peru & the Pacific:
this country

Home to Quezon City:
this island

Looming over Zermatt:
this 14,692-foot peak
Film in which Mandy Patinkin tells Wallace Shawn, "You keep using that word.  I do not think it means what you think it means"
This religious leader: "Inner tranquility comes from the development of love and compassion"

Nancy Reagan:
"A woman is like" this beverage item--"only in hot water do you realize how strong she is"
Churchill said he couldn't forecast the action of Russia: "It is a riddle wrapped in a mystery inside" this
Erich Fromm said, "The lust for" this "is not rooted in strength but in weakness"
In pre-Islamic Persia, most royal courts included a harem of wives & these, from the Latin for "lie together"
The sultan of this empire had August Wilhelmj play violin for his harem, allegedly the only non-castrated man ever invited in
Paul Poiret was known for designing lively-colored "harem" these
In April 2014 U.S. authorities seized this polygamist leader's Yearning for Zion Ranch in Texas
The Bible describes Solomon's harem, saying he loved "Moabites, Ammonites, Edomites... and" these -ites
This country is the main filling between the Red Sea & Libya
Until 2011, when the south part split away, it was the biggest country in Africa in total area
This Red Sea port in Yemen gave its name to a candy made with milk chocolate & coffee
The Red Sea Boys are the soccer team of this African country, the most recently independent Red Sea nation
Snorkel or sunbathe at the southernmost point in Israel, this resort city at the head of the Gulf of Aqaba
Pabst Blue Robot is Bender's favorite on this TV show
A blue ale is named for this warrior race related to Vulcans
You'll find ent-draughts, served by an old stick, in this trilogy
Harry Potter might get carded trying to drink a pint of this at The Three Broomsticks
This sitcom introduced Monkeyshine beer; Marcel was the mascot
A football get-together
As a verb it means to cook on a flat metal surface; as a noun, it is the flat metal surface
This type of circular ocean current moves in a direction contrary to the main current
Also called an offshore hake, this cod relative is often used in British fish & chips
Rennet & ferrous lactate are on the FDA's list of these substances
The world's fastest conventional one of these is France's TGV POS, which hit 357 mph in a 2007 test run
An inflatable life vest bears the name of this 1930s movie star
Like spaghetti, the spaghetti type of this vegetable is often served with tomato sauce
A friend has no fixed address? Send a letter to his main P.O. addressed: name, this 2-word term, city, state, ZIP
Since 2002 this Lower Manhattan area has had its own film festival
When he was just 24, Stephen Crane published this novel about Union soldier Henry Fleming
Oprah said that this Alice Walker novel was life-changing for her & she was honored to play a role in the movie
Perfect beach reading in 1951 was this James Jones novel set in Hawaii just before Pearl Harbor
"At Auschwitz, tell me, where was God?" is a query from this 1979 novel
This 1985 Cormac McCarthy novel has the alternate title "The Evening Redness in the West"

rounds.text: The writing of this novel, the author's first with no Canadian setting, appropriately began in 1984
